document_data.name: Taumarik
document_data.mainbody: '''Taumarik''' was a prince of [[Hartsvale]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Taumarik was the son of [[Grauman]], the king of Hartsvale in [[1489 DR]]. He was also married to [[Ylienna|Ylienna of Silverymoon]], and took poorly to the various insulting names given to Ylienna by the earls of Hartsvale.
document_data.History: In [[1486 DR]], Taumarik left Hartsvale to spend three years exploring [[Northwest Faer√ªn|the North]], upsetting many of the earls and nobility when he returned with a wife—the [[sorceress]] Ylienna of Silverymoon. Despite this political friction, Taurmarik still began taking on the responsibilities of the throne upon his return.
